description:
Last Updated: April 15th 2016 added new income report & Promotional Announcements Strategy

I currently make over $2500 a month selling online courses with Udemy as of April 2016. 

I have 23 courses for sale that are focused on the music industry and 3 teaching entrepreneurship in business.

Selling online courses is a billion dollar industry which makes it a huge opportunity for instructors to get in the game and start selling their knowledge.

Within a few months of getting serious about selling online courses with Udemy I saw a huge increase in monthly revenue considering the amount of time I put in.

Selling online courses can truly be a passive income and make you money while your sleeping. S.W.I.S.S Dollars - Sales - While - I - Sleep - Soundly

I have a background in online marketing selling one of the toughest digital products in all industries which is music. I've managed to sell millions of songs and make a great living with music so I am now taking my experience to teach online courses.

Selling online courses is an amazing opportunity to teach people what you know and get paid for it at the same time.

Don't wait any longer and start creating your first online course

Chris
title: How to Create a Fulfilling Career by Teaching Online
